com.xorprogramming.io

Class ExpandedSharedPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xorprogramming.io.ExpandedSharedPreferences
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SharedPreferences

    public class ExpandedSharedPreferences
extends Object
implements SharedPreferences

    A wrapper class for SharedPreferences that provides support for saving and retrieving additional data types. Note that there are two ways to modify the data. First, there is edit(), which return a standard SharedPreferences.Editor. Second, there is expandedEdit(), which return a ExpandedSharedPreferences.ExandedEditor.

    Example Usage:

     SharedPreferences prefs = context.getSharedPreferences(name, mode);
 ExpandedSharedPreferences prefs = new ExpandedSharedPreferences();
 prefs.getSerializable("cereal", null);
 prefs.expandedEdit().putDouble("test", 42).commit();

    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Steven Roberts
    See Also:
    SharedPreferences, ExpandedSharedPreferences.ExandedEditor

      • getByte

        public byte getByte(String key,
           byte defaultValue)
        Retrieve a byte value from the preferences.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve.
        defaultValue - Value to return if this preference does not exist.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or defValue.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - If there is a preference with this name that is not a byte

      • edit

        public SharedPreferences.Editor edit()

      • expandedEdit

        public ExpandedSharedPreferences.ExandedEditor expandedEdit()
        Create a new ExpandedSharedPreferences.ExandedEditor for these preferences, through which you can make modifications to the data in the preferences and atomically commit those changes back to the SharedPreferences object. Note that you must call ExpandedSharedPreferences.ExandedEditor.commit() to have any changes you perform in the Editor actually show up in the SharedPreferences.
        Returns:
        Returns a new instance of the ExpandedSharedPreferences.ExandedEditor interface, allowing you to modify the values in this SharedPreferences object.
